projects.name: RazorPay Clone
projects.description: Developed a fully functional clone of the Razorpay website, a payment gateway platform, from scratch. Designed frontend components using technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind.

projects.name: CodeHelp Blogs
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive code help blog webpage focusing on responsive web design principles and core CSS concepts. Implemented responsive design techniques using CSS media queries, flexbox, and grid layout to adapt webpage layouts across different devices and screen sizes. Demonstrated proficiency in HTML and CSS coding practices to create visually appealing and user-friendly webpages.

experiences.description: Completed a job simulation involving identity and access management (IAM) for Tata Consultancy Services, collaborating with a Cybersecurity Consulting team. Delivered comprehensive documentation and presentations, showcasing the ability to communicate complex technical concepts effectively.

Acquired foundational understanding of supervised learning techniques including linear regression, logistic regression, decision trees, and SVM, alongside exploration of unsupervised learning methods such as K-means clustering and PCA. Introduced to reinforcement learning principles including Q-learning and policy gradients, gaining insights into agent-environment interactions and application domains such as game playing and robotics.
